goal: Implement validation logic to check that files with status: 'absent' do not exist in the codebase
description: Extends the validator to handle the status field added in Task-082. When a manifest declares expectedArtifacts with status: 'absent', the validator verifies the file doesn't exist. If status is 'present' or unspecified, normal validation proceeds. Includes semantic validation to reject creatableFiles with status: 'absent'.

contains.name: _validate_absent_file
contains.description: Validates that a file with status 'absent' does not exist

contains.name: _validate_file_status_semantic_rules
contains.description: Validates semantic rules for file status (e.g., creatableFiles cannot have status 'absent')
